title: WHY DONT I GET MY 400 RP IN LVL 10!! WTF RIOT WHY

replies.body:
Dëlirium hit the nail on the head!

The new player [**level up rewards were changed**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp) awhile back. Nowadays you receive the premium hextech chest containing a skin and essence for a champion you currently own.
You receive a premium hextech chest, with a guaranteed 975RP skin of a champ that you own.
